case.title: BBW seeks great night out/long term - 34 (London)
case.text: Hi, Disillusioned with online dating I thought I'd give craigslist a go again, I've met some pretty interesting people after all. I'm looking for a wildly entertaining night with an attractive, cultured, articulate man. Drinks, nice food, plenty of flirting and banter, a sensational kiss and see where we want to go from there. Ideally I shouldn't be old enough to be your mother and I'm not looking to be your bit on the side. Please be genuine and interested in developing a relationship, because I am.
